post:
Limited offer for hostingdiscussion users until 29/09/2013:
Double memory for all plans, simply use the DOUBLERAM coupon to get double amount of memory.

Xen VPS Features
  • Instant Setup (Subject to passing our fraud screening);
  • Standard Support Service;
  • Equal Share of CPU;
  • Each VM has a dedicated share of memory and disk resources;
  • Powered by Citrix XenServer;
  • Highly secure isolation of VMs from each other;
  • Full SSH root access to your VM;
  • Uncontended memory, the amount of memory in the VM plan is exclusively assigned to each VM, no "overselling" of memory is possible;
  • 7 Day Money Back Guarantee;
  • UK / GB IP addresses;
  • 99.9% Network Uptime Guarantee;
  • Connectivity: 100 Mbps port / 1 Gbps port;
  • Anti-DDoS protection;
  • VPS Service Price Match Guarantee;
  • We do not oversell server resources (hardware , hard drive or memory)!
